title: Lobby filters
description: Filters for querying a list of lobbies

match_ongoing?.description: Returns only lobbies where the match_ongoing? property matches this value

require_tags.description: Returns only lobbies where all of the listed tags are present

exclude_tags.description: Returns only lobbies where none of the listed tags are present

passworded?.description: Select only lobbies with this passworded? value

locked?.description: Select only lobbies with this locked? value

public?.description: Select only lobbies with this public? value

match_type.description: Select only lobbies with these match_types

rated?.description: Select only lobbies with this rated? value

game_version.description: Select only lobbies with this game version

min_player_count.description: The minimum number of players (inclusive) a lobby must have

max_player_count.description: The maximum number of players (inclusive) a lobby must have
